description: *Sewer line construction service at Dorchester Penitentiary, New Brunswick
full_summary:
ITQ-EC016-240422_B: Tunnel Sewer System Replacement - Dorchester Penitentiary (Medium Sector)
==============================

**Bid Details**

*   Tender Number: WS4065523414-Doc4294495358
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: WS4065523414
*   Publication Date: November 7, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: December 1, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
*   Amendment Date: November 20, 2023
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not specified
*   Tender Status: Expired

**Solicitation Details**

*   Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Procurement Category: CNST-Sewer line construction services
*   Solicitation Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Project Description**

The Canadian Government, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites qualifications from eligible contractors for the replacement of aging sanitary sewer piping in the tunnels at Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick. Responsive contractors will have 65 weeks to complete the project.

**Tender Requirements**

*   Supply all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillaries
*   Perform replacement work in accordance with specifications and drawings
*   Comply with Canadian Trade Agreement (CFTA) requirements

**Bid Submission Requirements**

*   Documents submitted must be in either official language of Canada
*   Bidders may download the solicitation package from [insert link]
*   Respondents are responsible for ensuring timely and accurate submission of all required documentation

**Contact Information**

*   Sonia Stockman
*   Sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   For further information regarding the procurement process, please contact the above named representative.
